title: 820-3332-A
message:
Computer appears to start, then trips out. 

Bench PSU shows draw from .25ma to approx 1amp after 1 second. which then resets and starts again. 

Client says it sometimes turns on normally. 

Some kind of over voltage protection or a shorted component tripping a circuit?

Not sure where to start with this one :)

820-3332-a

title: 820-3332-A
message:
Resolder all U8900 pads with leaded solder first.
Is a "must do" anyway on this board.

Check if starts in SMC bypass mode.
Be sure to use original 85W charger.

title: 820-3332-A
message:
Hi

Did u8900  and replaced battery. All happy now.

Cheers.
